text: This game was incredibly underrated. If this was a Zelda game people would still rave about it today. This is my favourite tune from a great soundtrack. Just hauntingly beautiful.
author: Mark Davies

text: So... not only does this song remind me of Undertale's 'Another Medium', but the image in 0:56 reminds me of a specific map in the same game where Undyne collapses.
author: Madman Asa

text: That's one of the finest Zelda-clone ever made in my opinion. OST is stellar, gameplay is great and the story is... quite "strong" at times, way more serious than any Zelda will probably ever be. There's even Sonic getting a tan at the beach!
author: Stefano Messina

text: IIRC, this was called Soleil in Europe. I remember renting it and playing the hell out of it over a weekend. Great graphics and very fun to play.
